data.sampled: Myanmar is country located in South Asia. It has a diverse geography, with tropical forests in the north, arid deserts in the center, and high mountains in the south. The climate varies across the country, with temperatures ranging from warm to cold throughout the year. The people of Myanmar are diverse, consisting of several ethnic groups who have lived together for thousands of years. The dominant language of Myanmar is Burmese, which is spoken by the majority of the population. Other languages that are also spoken include Karen, Mon, Pali, and English. Myanmar is an emerging economy, known for its agriculture, mining, and tourism industries.
